featured.quote: Marquel was very professional and made me feel comfortable in front of the camera. My pictures are flawless, and she puts so much care into the work she does. I didn't feel rushed or stressed; I felt relaxed, and Marquel had so much patience. I highly recommend her.

grid.quote: Marquel responded quickly and delivered print ready headshots. She has a level of professionalism and service that allows the session to flow easily! I highly recommend Marquel!

problem.title: FEEL UNCOMFORTABLE IN FRONT OF THE CAMERA? YOU'RE NOT ALONE.
paragraphs: But avoiding it could be costing you opportunities.
An premium headshot experience can make all the difference.
Let me show you how much fun it can be!

team.title: Workplace Headshots
team.intro: Time is precious and efficiency is essential.
team.description: Workplace headshots are valuable and useful marketing tools for your company. Your clients want to know who they will be working with â€“ impress them!

text.intro: Hi there! I'm Marquel Forbes, your headshot photographer and confidence booster!
text.highlight: I'm so glad you're here! Many people tell me they hate getting their photo taken—
body: they feel awkward or nervous just thinking about it. If that sounds familiar, don't worry,
you're in the right place. I'm here to change your mind with just a little bit of your time.
Your LinkedIn profile photo is often the first impression companies get of you, so it needs
to show you at your best. As a headshot photographer, I specialize in helping you
feel comfortable and relaxed in front of the camera, so we can capture your true personality.
Let's make this a fun and enjoyable experience, and get you a photo that not only looks
great but also feels authentically you!

steps.title: Schedule
steps.description: Give the Calendar a Tap. Schedule your Session

steps.title: Shoot
steps.description: It's easier than it looks. come see what the fuss is about

steps.title: Download
steps.description: Download Your Images. Find greater success

items.question: What should I wear for my headshot?
items.answer: Choose solid colors that complement your skin tone and avoid busy patterns. Bring multiple outfit options so we can find what works best on camera. Professional attire works well for corporate headshots, while creative fields may allow more personality.

items.question: How long does a headshot session take?
items.answer: Most headshot sessions last about one hour. This gives us plenty of time to capture multiple looks, try different backgrounds, and ensure you're comfortable and relaxed in front of the camera.

items.question: When will I receive my photos?
items.answer: You'll receive your professionally retouched headshots within 5-7 business days after your session. Rush delivery options are available if you need your images sooner.

items.question: Can I bring someone with me to the session?
items.answer: Absolutely! You're welcome to bring a friend or colleague for support. Sometimes having a familiar face nearby helps you relax and feel more confident during the shoot.

items.question: Do you offer hair and makeup services?
items.answer: Yes! Professional hair and makeup services are available for an additional fee. I work with talented artists who specialize in camera-ready looks that photograph beautifully.

items.question: What if I'm not photogenic?
items.answer: Everyone is photogenic with the right photographer! I specialize in making people feel comfortable and bringing out their natural confidence. Many clients who thought they weren't photogenic are amazed by their results.

location.title: South Riding Studio Location
location.alt: Professional Photography studio, Marquel Yvette Photography
text: My studio is in located in South Riding, VA and clients come to me from across the entire DC Metropolitan area.
I am less than a mile from route 50, which you can reach via Route 606 as it runs behind Dulles Airport. If you are coming from Fairfax, the most direct route is Route 66 to Route 50.
You'll also find plenty of familiar landmarks nearby. Dulles Airport, Stone Springs Hospital, Pleasant Valley Golf Club, and Salamander Resort and Spa are all just minutes from my studio.
I look forward to seeing you at your headshot photo session.
